participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and creative, always eager to explore new worlds, both in games and in real life.
participant_1.background: I love video games. I am Canadian. My brother works at Best Buy. I have two cats, Milo and Fio.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Sociable and adventurous, I value friendships and enjoy exploring new places and cuisines.
participant_2.background: I can't live without my friends. My favorite food is Italian. I like to drive for hours. I have 10 piercings.

content.text: I love Italian food, too! What's your favorite dish?
I love lasagna, but I'm not very good at making it.
I love lasagna too! I'm not very good at making it either, but I'm getting better.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but I'm really into open-world RPGs right now.
Me too! I love exploring new worlds and meeting new characters.
I love that too! What's your favorite open-world RPG?
My favorite is probably Skyrim. I love the exploration and the character creation.
Skyrim is a great game! I love the magic system.
Me too! I love being able to cast spells and summon monsters.
Do you have any other pets?
I have a dog named Luna.
I love dogs! What breed is she?
She is! She's the best dog ever.
